main.name: Jacquelyn Bryant
main.description: An intermediate-level computer science student interested in working with Artificial Intelligence.
main.bio: I'm a rising third-year Cognitive Science (conc. Computer Science) student at the University of Virginia. I'm familiar with Java and Python, and I'm prepared to learn more. I'm also interested in combining my computing knowledge with the humanities.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
